okay so i experimenting with a new program and made this... what do you think? Yes, now that you’ve had your little argument moment can you shush now? I have better things to do then to relpy to you over something so stupid.

item.title: Dragon Giant War-Axe ((Double bladed axe)) [update]
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:13, topic:380211”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=476050.msg3481607#msg3481607 date=1296183670]

Well I think with a longer handle you can get a better swing meaning more damage? Anyways yer its alright a little plain maybe add something more dragonish to it like… a dragon tail at the end. Well not exactly that but you know what I mean yer? But its good other then that keep up the good work.

Lol a good weapon does not have decoration on it XD… thats why decorative swords are for show
my weaponry is ment to be usefull and look realistic

What do you think this is America!?!? Hmm … I haven’t used that line in awhile, anyways I think it’d be better for you if you make fantasy weapons. Let your creativity run wild because you’ll get further with your own kind of ideas. There isn’t anything wrong with a realistic weapon but detail is a must.
[/quote]

first of all im in canada america dosent effect me

second of all really? fantasy weapons? lol no thanks… i could make alot if i wanted to but… i dont want to…Plus the models i make is for P-servers… so adding details like that would go un noticed in clients[/quote]
Awesome and yer I know where you’re coming from but it’s not about just modelling for private servers its about making your skills better but if you don’t want to improve then I suggest you stick with the normal looks.

Read full topic

my weaponry is ment to be usefull and look realistic

first of all im in canada america dosent effect me

Well I think with a longer handle you can get a better swing meaning more damage? Anyways yer its alright a little plain maybe add something more dragonish to it like… a dragon tail at the end. Well not exactly that but you know what I mean yer? But its good other then that keep up the good work.
[/quote]

my weaponry is ment to be usefull and look realistic[/quote]
What do you think this is America!?!? Hmm … I haven’t used that line in awhile, anyways I think it’d be better for you if you make fantasy weapons. Let your creativity run wild because you’ll get further with your own kind of ideas. There isn’t anything wrong with a realistic weapon but detail is a must.

item.title: Dragon Giant War-Axe ((Double bladed axe)) [update]
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Yeah, the handle is a bit too long. The idea is kind of plain because it’s based on a Jagex model, and I would suggest moving away from RuneScape models. Other than that, I will admit that it’s not that bad.

actualy its not based on a jagex model O-o the name may be… but it is not at all based of the Dragon battle axe
Actualy it wasent even suppoose to be dragon, i was having a problem with the colors and decided to color it like it…

ps: its a giant war axe its suppose to be that big.

Read full topic
